Use a lockbox or safe to store valuable items. These can be secured with a combination or key, but they can also be secured with a combination lock.
Use a lock with a built-in keyless entry system. Some locks have a keyless entry system that can be unlocked using a code or a biometric scan.
Use a smart lock with a keyless entry system. These locks can be unlocked using a smartphone app or a code.
Use a lock with a keyless entry system and a backup key. These locks have a keyless entry system and a backup key in case the battery dies or the lock is not functioning properly.
Use a lock with a keyless entry system and a biometric scan. These locks can be unlocked using a fingerprint or facial recognition.
